This Format is a cherry pick :cherries::ok_hand: feature request form for adding content that may have come from another Spacestation fork. The more details you can provide, the better!

2. Have you checked the forks license agreement? Is it compatible with ours?
The license is: [AGPL3.0/Something Else]

If else, please describe, and include a link to the license.
